be.abeel.jargs
Class AutoHelpCmdLineParser

java.lang.Object
  jargs.gnu.CmdLineParser
      be.abeel.jargs.AutoHelpCmdLineParser

public class AutoHelpCmdLineParser
extends jargs.gnu.CmdLineParser

Command line parser with basic output for a -h/--help option. This option is automatically available at construction time.

Author:
Thomas Abeel
